entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Add Queue<T>.CopyTo(Span<T> destination) #69954
  • Tar tests that interact with file assets do not work on Browser #69953
    7.0.0
  • Reading and Installing specific dotnet workload versions? #69951
  • [NativeAOT] Investigate esoteric failures in System.Linq.Expression.Tests #69944
  • [NativeAOT] System.Linq.Expression.Tests - add NumericOperators to rd.xml #69943
  • [libraries-pgo] Assertion failed 'asgNode->OperIs(GT_ASG)' in during 'Morph - Global' #69939
  • [libraries-pgo] Assertion failed '(m_block->bbNext == nullptr) || (m_block->bbNext->bbPrev == m_block)' during 'Update flow graph opt pass' #69938
  • System.Text.Json cannot bind to fields #69936
  • [API Proposal]: Allow multiple Global Extended Attributes entries in Tar archives with PAX format #69935
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] random `memory access out of bounds` in `System.Xml.XmlSchemaSet.Tests` on linux #69934
    7.0.0

Closed

  • ildasm and ilasm round trip can fail with function pointers on macOS #69952
  • Regex.Match(string input, int startat) fails with ^ prefix. #69949
  • JIT assert on arm32 when running DllImportGenerator unit tests: remainingSize == 4 #60705
    7.0.0
  • Unexpected JIT helper in TreatAsHasRetBufArg #69612
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] perf pipeline builds failing to build the wasm app #69861
    7.0.0
  • Implement Write(T) Overloads in FastSerializer #8084
    Future
  • Move the MetadataLabel Interner into FastSerialization #8087
    Future
  • Support Specifying Session on WriteEvent #8089
    Future
  • [wasm][aot] Assertion failure - `unexpected GC filler class` in `Microsoft.VisualBasic.Core.Tests` #63749
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: PemEncoding.WriteString #65144
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in MicroBenchmarks.Serializers #69730
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Wasm AOT micro optimizations #69955
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [Draft] Move Format property from TarReader to TarEntry #69950
    area-System.IO, blocked, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Rename NativeMemory.ZeroMemory #69948
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Enable folding of struct indirs used by returns in local morph #69947
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: fix jit stress now that W^X is enabled #69946
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable Expression tests for NativeAOT #69945
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • handle SECURITY_STATUS 0x80090016 #69942
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Split out and generalize tailcall IR validation/tailcall profile adjustments #69941
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize Array.GetFlattenedIndex (all runtimes) and InternalGetValue (CoreCLR) #69940
    community-contribution
  • Change dispenser policy for RuntimeAssembly to ReuseAlways #69937
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Draft] Allow multiple Global Extended Attributes entries in Tar archives with PAX format #69933
    area-System.IO, blocked, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1794944 #69932
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [IGNORE] `perf-wasm` pipeline #69931
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm

Merged

  • Remove unused MissingMemberException.FormatSignature #69890
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Optimize better with maximum array length #69735
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Relax the address exposure condition in forward substitution #69818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Handle mis-sized structs in ARM/64 `PUTARG_STK` codegen #69905
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: allow pinvoke calli helper in TreatAsShouldHaveRetBufArg #69927
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Refactoring the generic-math CreateChecked/Saturating/Truncating APIs to match API review #69756
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • Pin char when UTF-16 marshalling is specified and runtime marshalling is disabled #69837
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Explicitly include mscorlib.dll, to support scanning assemblies #69886
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Implement LoadLibraryErrorTracker #69842
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][wasm] Pin thrown exceptions during EH. #69916
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Implement PemEncoding.WriteString #69877
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Remove Or, And, Not + related fixes #69839
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [MONO] Factor marshal-lightweight out of marshal-ilgen #69208
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix Stream.ReadAtLeast perf regression in DataContractSerializer #69879
    area-Serialization

Updated

  • Consolidate morphing of local nodes #69819
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Aggressive GC #69695
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Delete `GT_INDEX` #69917
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Resumbmit tar feedback changes, include Android build fix #69469
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Zip64ExtraField reads StartDiskNumber as uint32 #62959
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Convert Valuetype.FastEqualsCheck and GetHashCodeOfPtr to managed #69723
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • JIT: defer some flow graph reordering until after loop recognition #69878
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Release/6.0] JIT: fix interaction of GDV and boxing (#60355) #69630
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove unneeded unconditional jumps #69041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Handle "mis-sized" structs in XARCH `PUTARG_STK` codegen #68611
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Utilize VN-based non-null knowledge better #69808
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete an old quirk from `gtSetEvalOrder` #69894
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Morph `ASG(ONE_FLD_STRUCT, CALL)` using `BITCAST` #61049
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Support immutable types with configuration binding #67258
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Rev .NET 5 to net6.0 or $(NetCoreAppCurrent) #69911
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Draft] Fix hard link creation in tar tests in Android, iOS, tvOS #69416
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Add support for symbolicating traces via XHarness #66226
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Do not add x86 host to PATH on 64-bit machines #69902
    area-Setup, 7.0.0
  • Improve Encoding.UTF8.GetMaxByte/CharCount perf #69910
    area-System.Text.Encoding, 7.0.0
  • Some cleanups in Native AOT suspension area #69885
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Fix some incorrect SpecialFolder entries for Unix #68610
    area-System.Runtime, breaking-change, os-linux, os-mac-os-x, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • [Release/6.0] Fix singlefile bundle alignment on OSX ARM64 #69930
    area-Single-File
  • Remove more wprintf usages #69912
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
